last_episode_to_air.name: Trophy Bean
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mr Bean is forced to babysit Mrs Wicket's nephew on an Outward Bound day course.

name: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
overview: The animated daily trials and tribulations of clueless yet clever loner Mr Bean (aided by his best friend Teddy of course!) as he stumbles from one mishap to the next, always finding complex solutions to the simplest of problems.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Unlike the first two seasons, Season 3 is the first season to be broadcast daily on CITV rather than a Saturday night prime-time slot on ITV1 as well as the first to have 18 single episodes rather than back-to-back segments.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Following an 11-year hiatus, a new revived series consisting of 52 episodes each lasting for 11 minutes began broadcasting in February 2015.

episodes.name: In The Wild
episodes.overview: Bean sees a nature show on TV and sets out to snap some wildlife pictures of his own. It turns out to be more difficult than he things when all the animals elude him and he eventually gets caught up in a fox hunt.

episodes.name: Missing Teddy
episodes.overview: Teddy gets kidnapped by a duo of burglars who stole every teddy bear across London. To save him, Mr. Bean tracks down and thwarts the burglars, retrieves Teddy and returns the rest of the teddy bears to their owners.

episodes.name: No Parking
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean wants to watch the film Titanic, but he has serious difficulties finding a parking space. Bean eventually parks his Mini, but upon arriving at the cinema, the film is already in its conclusion, disgruntling him.

episodes.name: Bean's Bounty
episodes.overview: While driving along, Bean spots an archaeological dig site and stops to take some photos. When Bean eventually gets kicked out, he builds a metal detector and sets off to find some treasures of his own.

episodes.name: Mime Games
episodes.overview: Because he fails to pay a street mime in the park, the mime follows Mr. Bean when he's not looking and breaks Mrs. Wicket's water statue. Eventually, Bean out-mimes him, kidnaps the man disguising as a silver statue and uses him to replace the broken water statue.

episodes.name: Spring Clean
episodes.overview: Noticing the disastrous state of his house, Mr. Bean checks the calendar and decides it's time to do some spring cleaning and tidy up the place.

episodes.name: Birthday Bear
episodes.overview: On Teddy's birthday, Mr. Bean decides to invite his girlfriend Irma Gobb to Teddy's birthday party at night. However, Irma becomes unhappy and uncomfortable at the party due to Bean's unfair play. When it's 9:00 pm, Bean shows Irma the fireworks display and she feels better.

episodes.name: The Mole
episodes.overview: Mrs. Wicket's croquet game is interrupted by an offending mole. Mr. Bean tries to get rid of it but keeps on failing until he finally manages to capture it. Mrs. Wicket orders Bean to kill it with a croquet hammer but Bean, having mercy not to kill it, puts it in a jar and releases it in the wild.

episodes.name: Roadworks
episodes.overview: Workers dig up the street out front of Bean's house making lots of noise, and making the furniture bounce around. Bean tries to quiet them down.

episodes.name: The Sofa
episodes.overview: Bean's sofa falls apart and he goes to the store to buy a new one but it costs more than he can afford. Bean holds a yard sale to try and make some money.

episodes.name: Treasure!
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean finds a box containing loads of puzzles pieces. He puts the pieces together but there is one missing. Meanwhile, Mr. Bean also tries to find treasure with a map he finds.

episodes.name: Homeless
episodes.overview: Mrs. Wicket finally throws Mr. Bean out and he needs a new home. Mr. Bean finds a newspaper with loads of houses to choose from. Will he ever find the perfect home?

episodes.name: Nurse!
episodes.overview: Mr.Bean gets inspired by Mrs Wicket's injury that he fakes one just to have a luxurious stay at the hospital, but things don't turn out the way he expected

episodes.name: Dead Cat
episodes.overview: Mr Bean has to decorate the corridor with new wallpaper and Scrapper gets in the way as usual. When Scrapper gets carried off somewhere due to Bean's fury, he has to find a replacement Cat before Mrs Wicket gets back.

episodes.name: Super Trolley
episodes.overview: Mr.Bean invented home-made shopping cart in order to go shopping for Mrs. Wicket and himself and avoiding the mall manager at the same time.

episodes.name: Magpie
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean saves an injured magpie from a tree and cares for it at his house. But the magpie flies away though and steals valuables!

episodes.name: Cat-Sitting
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean has to look after Scrapper while Mrs. Wicket is at the doctors with a broken leg. But Scrapper is so vicious and scary he starts tearing up the house.

episodes.name: The Bottle
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean buys a bottle with a boat in it, but loses it. A milkman mistakes it for a bottle of milk and Mr. Bean must retrieve the bottle at night.

episodes.name: Goldfish
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean wants Teddy to do water tricks, but his teddy ends up becomes very stinky so he brings it to the laundry shop to be cleaned.

episodes.name: Inventor
episodes.overview: An inventor comes to the house who upstages Mr. Bean and amazes Mrs. Wicket. Mr. Bean has some dastardly tricks up his sleeve though.

episodes.name: Royal Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean breaks his favourite cup with a picture of the Queen on it, his search for a new one eventually leads him to Buckingham Palace.

episodes.name: Young Bean
episodes.overview: After Bean snatches a piece of Mrs Wicket's freshly baked cake, he hides in the loft and takes a ride down memory lane.

episodes.name: In the Pink
episodes.overview: After a robbery in the pet shop Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with a strange pink animal.

episodes.name: Dinner for Two
episodes.overview: Whenever you're you invited over to Mr. Bean's house for dinner, it's best to bring your own sandwiches!

episodes.name: The Ball
episodes.overview: When Mr. Bean accidently hits the neighbours ball onto the roof, he has to get it back. He faces a pass of panic and peril including nearly falling out of a window!

episodes.name: Toothache
episodes.overview: Poor Mr. Bean has a toothache. He tries various things, and when he can't get it to stop hurting he wears a yellow fang, and it scares everyone in the dentists office!

episodes.name: Haircut
episodes.overview: Mr.Bean has a picture taking from The daily Blah but his hair just getting messy even when brushed,and he has to get a haircut but ends up in a disastrous result.

episodes.name: Neighbourly Bean
episodes.overview: The next door neighbours keep making really annoying noises that drive Mr. Bean crazy and keep him from watching his show on the television.

episodes.name: Car Trouble
episodes.overview: After Mr. Bean's lime green Mini, his life long dream car since he was a boy, breaks down, he goes to a mechanic and is tricked into thinking it is beyond repair.

episodes.name: Restaurant
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean decides to go for a night at a restaurant, but he would have to share the night with a couple of famous people.

episodes.name: Art Thief
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean is hot on the trail against an international art thief in a great chase from Britain to France and back!

episodes.name: Scaredy Bean
episodes.overview: It's a nightmare on Bean Street as Mr. Bean goes to see a horror movie.

episodes.name: Hot Date
episodes.overview: On a beautiful night, Mr. Bean takes Irma out on a date but forgets to bring his wallet, making things extremely complicated in the process!

episodes.name: Wanted
episodes.overview: A case of mistaken identity lands Mr. Bean in prison while an escaped convict pretends to be Mr. Bean. Question is: who has the better life?

episodes.name: Gadget Kid
episodes.overview: Mr Bean is dogged by a young Japanese boy in the Science Museum and takes an instant dislike to the scallywag until he sees what he has in his knapsack, gadgets so cool that one cannot get them in the West.

episodes.name: The Visitor
episodes.overview: Mr Bean cannot place the face of the uninvited bloke on his doorstep. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck, eating him out of house and home.

episodes.name: Big TV
episodes.overview: When the television blows up during Mr Bean and Irma's squabble over what to watch, Mr Bean invents his own ingenious form of home entertainment.

episodes.name: Keyboard Capers
episodes.overview: Determined to finish Beethoven's symphony, Mr Bean wrangles himself a grand piano, a music book, and a candelabra.

episodes.name: Artful Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean becomes an unlikely artists when he moves out into nature to find inspiration for the perfect painting.

episodes.name: The Fly
episodes.overview: Angry at an annoying fly buzzing around his room, Mr Bean declares war against it. He uses several outlandish weapons to get rid of it.

episodes.name: A Royal Makeover
episodes.overview: Mr Bean decides to decorate his room in the style of Buckingham Palace and selects the same wallpaper as used by the Queen. Meanwhile, his landlady Mrs Wicket suffers from delusions of grandeur and crowns herself as Queen of the Street.

episodes.name: SuperMarrow
episodes.overview: Mr Bean finds himself in a race to grow a giant marrow with his next-door neighbour. There is prize money at stake and a chance to get his photo in the papers.

episodes.name: A Running Battle
episodes.overview: Head-to-head competition with another runner, Goddawin, via the hospital and the department store.

episodes.name: Egg and Bean
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean adopts a strange, orphaned bird - a stork. When it grows, Bean tries to make it fly but failed until it managed to fly. When he watched his funny show, he saw the stork with a family.

episodes.name: Camping
episodes.overview: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about summers at scout camp as a boy, and he plans a night under the stars.

episodes.name: Chocks Away
episodes.overview: When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by a mean-spirited kid, Mr Bean sets his sights on revenge.

episodes.name: Hopping Mad!
episodes.overview: Mr Bean's landlady invites the mayor for tea, but the frog spawn in Mr Bean's bath hatch and hundreds of agitated amphibians invite themselves as well.

episodes.name: A Grand Invitation
episodes.overview: After saving a lady's dog, Mr. Bean is invited to lunch at this grand old desperate manor house.

episodes.name: No Pets
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean adopts a dog, then a parrot, then a chameleon, but Mrs. Wicket won't allow for any other pet than Scrapper in her house.

episodes.name: Ray of Sunshine
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean is desperate for a suntan and he chases a sunbeam across town.

episodes.name: Bean in Love
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean falls in love in beautiful singer and has a wish to have an autograph on her. But his attempts mostly foiled by the bodyguard until he managed to get a mark from roxy using her handkerchief and Bean is happy.

episodes.name: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: A chance encounter with his doppelganger - will Bean lose Irma to Mr. Pod?

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Unlike the first two seasons, Season 3 is the first season to be broadcast daily on CITV rather than a Saturday night prime-time slot on ITV1 as well as the first to have 18 single episodes rather than back-to-back segments.

episodes.name: Home Movie
episodes.overview: Bean attempts to make his own home movie - a horror thriller with Mrs Wicket as the star!

episodes.name: Fish Sitting
episodes.overview: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wicket's goldfish, but Scrapper the cat is keen to help.

episodes.name: The Cruise
episodes.overview: An accident aboard a cruise ship causes Bean to end up stranded on an island.

episodes.name: Coconut Shy
episodes.overview: Mr Bean hopes to win some cash prizes at the funfair, but it is not as easy as it seems!

episodes.name: Green Bean
episodes.overview: When Mrs. Wicket shuts off Bean's electricity, he finds an environmental-friendly solution.

episodes.name: Cash Machine
episodes.overview: Mr Bean tries to retrieve his credit card from a cash dispenser and inadvertently ends up trapped in a bank vault.

episodes.name: Litterbugs
episodes.overview: Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town.

episodes.name: Rat Trap
episodes.overview: Bean has to deal with an unwanted house guest, but the stubborn pest refuses to leave.

episodes.name: Valentine's Bean
episodes.overview: Bean tries to be romantic but his idea of what that means proves very different to Irma's!

episodes.name: All You Can Eat
episodes.overview: Mr Bean enters a competition to win a trolley of free food.

episodes.name: Flat Pack
episodes.overview: Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase, failing miserably!

episodes.name: Holiday for Teddy
episodes.overview: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside - but a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all to herself.

episodes.name: The Newspaper
episodes.overview: Every time Bean goes to collect the newspaper from the letterbox it has disappeared. Who can be taking it?

episodes.name: Viral Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean becomes a famous internet sensation.

episodes.name: Super Spy
episodes.overview: Mr Bean is obsessed by his TV hero Super Spy and is excited when his very own Super Spy kit arrives in the post.

episodes.name: Scout Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not win him any friends.

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: Mr Bean inadvertently becomes a teacher - but can he control the unruly class?

episodes.name: Lord Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean finds out he is a lord and visits his Scottish family home - but keeping a castle is a costly business.

episodes.name: Car Wars
episodes.overview: Mr Bean finally has a showdown with the mysterious Reliant Robin. Who will be the victor?

episodes.name: Wedding Day
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean has to get the bride to the church on time - any way he can!

episodes.name: Bean Phone
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean wants a smartphone, but he does not have enough money to buy one. Instead, he makes a smartphone-like object; a large rucksack with smartphone "applications".

episodes.name: Hotel Bean
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean has some unexpected Japanese guests who think he runs a hotel.

episodes.name: Jurassic Bean
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean goes in search of wildlife, but he's not expecting to see anything prehistoric!

episodes.name: Caring Bean
episodes.overview: Mrs. Wicket is injured and Mr. Bean has to look after her.

episodes.name: Opera Bean
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean ends up on stage at the opera house - in a dress!

episodes.name: Taxi Bean
episodes.overview: A dodgy cabbie thinks he can take Bean for a ride.

episodes.name: Muscle Bean
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean needs to impress Irma, who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman.

episodes.name: A New Friend
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean befriends a very hungry and very noisy seagull.

episodes.name: The Lift
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean finds himself in a difficult situation when he and Teddy gets stuck in the lift of a toy store.

episodes.name: Dig This
episodes.overview: While digging in the garden, Mr. Bean unearths an unexploded bomb.

episodes.name: Bean Hypnotized
episodes.overview: When chosen to be hypnotised by Dr. Daze, Mr. Bean turns into a dog, a dancer and a hopeless romantic.

episodes.name: Car Wash
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean builds a car washing machine that attracts all manner of customers and some very pesky pigeons.

episodes.name: Where Did You Get That Cat?
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wicket's flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper.

episodes.name: Valuable Lessons
episodes.overview: A pair of burglars attempt to get their hands on Mrs. Wicket's fortune by way of marriage.

episodes.name: Halloween
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean prepares to give the neighborhood kids some tricks and treats they will not forget, but gets carried away with his spooky pranks and becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks by his neighbors, the Bruisers.

episodes.name: Bean Painting
episodes.overview: Artful Mr. Bean gets a real bug for painting.

episodes.name: Wrestle Bean
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean becomes an accidental wrestling champion with a little help from Mrs. Wicket and her friend.

episodes.name: Rare Bird
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean loves bird spotting and is desperate to tick off the last elusive bird in his book.

episodes.name: Bean's Safari
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

episodes.name: A Round of Golf
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean fancies a game of golf, so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to come over for a round.

episodes.name: Superhero Bean
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean becomes a superhero in an attempt to stop a cunning thief who stole his wallet and Mrs. Wicket's jewelry.

episodes.name: What a Load of Rubbish
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean is a bit too enthusiastic while cleaning his flat; Teddy accidentally gets thrown away and he ends up on his way to the rubbish dump.

episodes.name: The Robot
episodes.overview: Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up trashing half the town.

episodes.name: Ice Cream
episodes.overview: Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van, but ends up serving himself - along with every kid in town.

episodes.name: Birthday Party
episodes.overview: Mr Bean is feeling down. Everyone has forgotten his birthday - and to make it worse Mrs Wicket is having a noisy party downstairs.

episodes.name: In the Garden
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean tries to mow the lawn in the garden, but finds it difficult and inconvenient.

episodes.name: A Magic Day Out
episodes.overview: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside, where his trunk gets accidentally swapped with that of a stage magician.

episodes.name: Ball Pool
episodes.overview: Mr Bean does not like sharing the local soft play area with all those annoying kids. So he decides to convert his flat.

episodes.name: Pizza Bean
episodes.overview: Bean orders a takeaway pizza, but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own.

episodes.name: The Photograph
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean needs a new passport photograph and goes to incredible lengths to get one.

episodes.name: Dancing Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean needs to learn to dance to impress his girlfriend Irma.

episodes.name: Bean Shopping
episodes.overview: Mr Bean is locked in a department store overnight and has the time of his life.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Following an 11-year hiatus, a new revived series consisting of 52 episodes each lasting for 11 minutes began broadcasting in February 2015.

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: Mr Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs Wicket's nephew. He decides he must have his own console.

episodes.name: Special Delivery
episodes.overview: Mrs Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs Wicket to make sure it is delivered.

episodes.name: A Dog's Life
episodes.overview: Mr. Bean is charged with keeping an eye on Irma's dog Mopsy, but Mopsy is a very wilful pooch! Who is really in charge of who?

episodes.name: Big Stink
episodes.overview: Mr Bean crashes his mini into a pool of slurry and is desperate to get himself and his car - and poor Teddy - clean again!

episodes.name: Birthday Bother
episodes.overview: It's Irma's birthday. Bean writes out two cards - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card.

episodes.name: Bed Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he can't. Next morning, he goes to buy a brand-new bed.

episodes.name: Spa Day
episodes.overview: Mrs Wicket demands Mr Bean drive her and Miss Wince to the spa, and wait outside until they are done. But Mr Bean soon gets bored waiting around, and looks for fun instead.

episodes.name: Charity Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean is cajoled by Irma and spurred by jealousy of the fund-raising star Declan into raising money for a donkey sanctuary.

episodes.name: Bean Encore
episodes.overview: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean won't pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better.

episodes.name: Mobile Home
episodes.overview: Miss Wince takes Mrs Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan and Bean is left behind. But never one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect `quiet spot'.

episodes.name: Haunted House
episodes.overview: Mr Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house.

episodes.name: Eau De Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs Wicket's new, expensive perfume on the floor. He has to try and hide the crime and cover his tracks.

episodes.name: Running on Empty
episodes.overview: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but will it be enough?

episodes.name: Bean Bug
episodes.overview: Mr Bean has little issue scratching a certain itch and ends up calling on Mrs Wicket for help.

episodes.name: Coffee Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean is determined to make the best cup of java, ever. Oh, and to get rich brewing it.

episodes.name: The Big Freeze
episodes.overview: It's cold, the boiler is broken, and Mr Bean has to get warm, fast.

episodes.name: Scrapper Cleans Up
episodes.overview: Mr Bean enters Scrapper into a beauty contest so that he can win first prize.

episodes.name: Coach Trip
episodes.overview: Mr Bean disguises himself as a pensioner in order to avoid lunch with Irma and her mum.

episodes.name: Save That Tree
episodes.overview: Mr Bean climbs into his favourite tree to stop it from being chopped down.

episodes.name: For Sale
episodes.overview: Mrs Wicket is selling up and moving on, but what will happen to Mr Bean?

episodes.name: Jumping Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean takes on the Bruisers at the local skateboard park, using only a mobility scooter.

episodes.name: Cat Chaos
episodes.overview: Mrs Wicket becomes inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing. Mr Bean investigates.

episodes.name: Stick It
episodes.overview: Mr Bean has finished his model car collection, what next? What about football stickers?

episodes.name: Bean at the Museum
episodes.overview: Mr Bean digs up Bruiser Snr's medallion and rushes off to the local museum convinced he's found treasure.

episodes.name: A Car for Irma
episodes.overview: Mr Bean pimps his car in order to prove to Declan - a rival in love - that Bean's car is better.

episodes.name: Trophy Bean
episodes.overview: Mr Bean is forced to babysit Mrs Wicket's nephew on an Outward Bound day course.
